Text:
Holy kingdom [*] of the Redeemer,
	our treasure of eternal worth,
	and guiding star of our hope.
 Give mercy to all who have fallen,
	yet desire to rise again.

 Home of the holy Creator,
	worthy of endless wonder,
	and source of pure divine love.
Accepting with praise Christs Kingdom invitation,
	have mercy on us sinners.
Changes: 2022-08-31 - Paul Prins, Jordan Prins: Created this Antiphon.
